about_the_game:
The Cities of Sorcery (5E)


Come experience this unabridged, comprehensive mega-adventure!

Compiling the full Cities of Sorcery adventures series from Folio 8-13, as well as supplemental mini-adventures (six of them) and the Valoria City supplement, this is a true monster of an adventure.

Written in 5E mechanics, this huge text has been designed to mimic the essence of the classic 1980s 'Orange Spine' hardcovers and has an original cover by iconic artist Jeff Easley.

With both 2D and 3D maps, Iconic Characters, campaign characters sheets, and more, this isn't something to miss out on if you are a true hardcore gamer.

This module includes:

  • The Cities of Sorcery Adventures series from Folios 8-13
  • Supplemental Mini-Adventures (one for each of the six modules)
  • Valoria - Patina Court Places supplement
  • Over 100+ encounters pre-built and ready to be added to maps with a click of a button.
  • Over 320+ story entries with full descriptions and links to images, encounters, treasure parcels, and more.
  • Over 125+ images and maps.
  • Over 85+ NPCs and Monsters

Converted to Fantasy Grounds by Rob Twohy

Released on August 04, 2017. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.2.2 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and the included 5E Ruleset.
